settings.title: FAQ's
Is my payment data safe with you?
settings.text: All direct payment gateways adhere to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover.

settings.title: Do you accept online payments?
settings.text:
Yes, we accept online payments. All payment processing and vital customer information is quick, easy, and secure.

Learn more about our store's safe checkout experience (powered by Shopify) here.

settings.title: Where can I learn more about the payment and processing on your store?
settings.text: For more insight, you may also want to read Shopify’s Terms of Service here or Privacy Statement here.

settings.title: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.text: We accept payments from major credit card companies like Visa, Mastercard, and American Express.

settings.title: Payments & Safety
How long does it take to get my products?
settings.text:
All orders ship within 24 business hours! From here the time in transit is determined by the shipping you've chosen.

You can read more about this in our Shipping Policy.

Due to global supply chain challenges, shipping times could be longer than usual.

settings.title: Do you offer insurance on orders?
settings.text: Yes! Shipping insurance is automatically added to the cart. The shipping insurance will amount will automatically change according to your cart value. If you wish to opt out, you can easily remove it from your cart or turn it off on the checkout page!

settings.title: Is there free shipping?
settings.text: Yes! We happily offer free shipping for all USA orders over $25.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.text: Yes! We are so happy to offer global shipping to clients across the world!

settings.title: Do you ship to my area?
settings.text:
A full list of all of our shipping areas can be found here.

If your country or region is not mentioned, please feel free to reach out to see if we can work out the details.

settings.title: Shipping & Delivery
Do you offer refunds?
settings.text:
We do not offer refunds back to original payment method. All refunds are done in form of store credit.

For more information please visit our Refund Policy.

settings.title: How long after I complete a purchase can I return or exchange a product?
settings.text: Returns and exchanges must be submitted within 14 days of delivery.

settings.title: How much can I get refunded?
settings.text:
In the case when theproduct and packaging are unopened and undamaged, you areeligiblefor a full refund.

In the case whenthe packaging has been opened and the product has been used, you areeligiblefor a partial refund.

In the case when aproduct has been damaged, and the damage is not covered by your warranty, you arenot eligiblefor a refund.

Please check our Terms of Service to see if you're eligible for a refund.

settings.title: Who pays the shipping costs in the case of a refund when the order doesn't have free shipping?
settings.text: When an order does not include free shipping, all shipping costs (including the return shipping) are handled by the customer.

settings.title: Who pays the shipping costs in the case of a return when the order was shipped with free shipping?
settings.text: When you return an item from an order with free shipping, the cost of shipping will be deducted from your store credit for the shipping to you and returned to us.

settings.title: Who pays the shipping costs in the case of an exchange when the order was shipped with free shipping?
settings.text: When you return an item for exchange with free shipping, the cost of shipping will be deducted from your store credit for the return shipping only.

settings.title: Returns & Exchanges
How often are subscription boxes sent?
settings.text: Your first box will be sent within five business days of placing your order! After this they will ship every 30, 60 or 90 days depending on whichever option you choose :)

settings.title: How do I change the size of t-shirt in my subscription box?
How do I cancel my subscription box?
settings.text: To cancel your subscription box, login to your account.

settings.title: Can I cancel my subscription box at any time?
settings.text: Yes! You are easily able to cancel your subscription box at anytime. There are no contracts with this subscription.

settings.title: Subscription Box
